max_log_files.name: Log file limit
max_log_files.description: The maximum number of log files stored in the logging directory

priorities_in_mod_view.name: Show priorities in mod view
priorities_in_mod_view.description: Show mod priorities when viewing mods in a selected profile

show_short_license.name: Hide license details
show_short_license.description: Only show the name and type of each license

roblox_reinstall_after_changes.name: Reinstall Roblox after changes
roblox_reinstall_after_changes.description: Force Roblox to reinstall after selecting a different mod profile

roblox_force_reinstall.name: Force Roblox reinstallation
roblox_force_reinstall.description: Force Roblox to reinstall on next launch

discord_rpc.name: Discord RPC
discord_rpc.description: Show your friends on Discord that you're using this program
